properties.areaDesc: Lake St. Clair Open Lake (U.S. Portion); Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to North Cape MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 4:12PM EST until January 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 23 knots from the west
with gusts up to 39 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 3 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 4 feet.

* WHERE...Lake St Clair and Michigan waters of Lake Erie.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 4 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 5 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EST SUNDAY
